description: Paraguay cancela sus vuelos a Europa. Paraguay canceled its flights from Europa. It was announced on the 12th of March 2020 and started on the 14th of March. It was supposed to end on the 26th of March 2020.
target_geog_level: One or more regional groupings

description:
Paraguay cancela sus vuelos a Europa. Paraguay canceled its flights from Europa. It was announced on the 12th of March 2020 and started on the 14th of March. It was supposed to end on the 26th of March 2020.  

UPDATE: Starting the 14th of March 2020, Paraguay canceled its flights coming from Europa. This was supposed to end on the 26th of March 2020. However, on the 18th of March, from now on only Paraguayans can take flights to go to Paraguay. Thus, this new policy ends the policy regarding the suppression of flights from Europa. UPDATE: Starting the 14th of March 2020, Paraguay cancelled its flights coming from Europa. This was supposed to end on the 26th of March 2020. However, on the 18th of March, from now on only Paraguayans can take flights to go to Paraguay. Thus, this new policy ends the policy regarding the suppression of flights from Europa.
